title: 我的世界教育版注册不了
author: 忘心少年
txt_content:
用qq邮箱注册的
下面是mojang给的邮件
Your account is set up and ready to go.To help you get going, we've pulled together some resources on our Starter Kit page, including:Training Videos
Sample Lessons
Starter Worlds
Teachers to Connect With
Excited and ready to dive right in? See what other educators are discussing, explore the lesson plan library and perhaps upload one of your own, or download classroom mode so you can always stay a step ahead of your students.

replies.txt_content: 可能因为你不是学生（必须要有一个教育机构才可以使用，不是给普通人使用）
